Add.Name: GetIMediaFileXml
Add.SerializedFunction: <f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Data.Types.IMediaFile.GetIMediaFileXml"><f:param name="PropertyNames"><f:paramelement value="Id" /><f:paramelement value="CompositePath" /><f:paramelement value="StoreId" /><f:paramelement value="Title" /><f:paramelement value="Description" /><f:paramelement value="Culture" /><f:paramelement value="MimeType" /><f:paramelement value="Length" /><f:paramelement value="CreationTime" /><f:paramelement value="LastWriteTime" /><f:paramelement value="IsReadOnly" /><f:paramelement value="FolderPath" /><f:paramelement value="FileName" /></f:param><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Filter"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Data.Types.IMediaFile.MediaFolderFilter"><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="MediaFolder"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Utils.GetInputParameter"><f:param name="InputParameterName" value="MediaFolder" /></f:function></f:param><f:param name="IncludeSubfolders" value="True" /></f:function></f:param></f:function>
